name: Me and my dog
description:
This is a short game made for the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam.

Controls:

SpaceSwitch charactersWASDMovement

You can only activate a pressure plate if you are a dog.

You can only activate levers if you are a human.

Boxes with golden edges are moveable.

The human has to touch the arrow to complete the level.

Story:

You are a guide dog helping your blind human cross a dungeon!

Take control of each player to cross the dungeon!
